understanding_and_following_instructions.description: Assesses the system's capability to comprehend and adhere to the task's specific requirements.

research_capability.description: Evaluates the ability of the system to conduct research and navigate through relevant sources.

analytical_capability.description: Evaluates the system's ability to analyze information and extract relevant data.

correctness_of_solution.description: Assesses the accuracy of the compound identified by the system.

relevance_of_solution.description: Measures the relevance of the proposed compound in relation to the task's criteria.

transparency_of_reasoning.description: Evaluates how clearly the system's reasoning and decision-making process is documented.

traceability_of_steps.description: Determines if the steps taken can be traced and understood logically.
